General.Name: Palma Serasih PT
General.Description: PT Palma Serasih Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the palm oil plantation and processing business in Indonesia. The company also provides construction and trading services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Permata Kuningan Building, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12980
